title: 关于ubuntu运行已安装fabric的minecraft出错
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-6-30 10:54 编辑 

本人新手ubuntu用户，目前用的是能力dalao 1.14.4的整合包。该包在windows下游戏体验正常但在ubuntu下由HMCL3.3.172启动后崩溃。还望各位dalao帮小的解惑，谢谢！
[fly]以下为报错代码[/fly]（同附件）
Command: /usr/local/java/jre/bin/java "-Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft/versions/能力整合[1.14.4]-Fabric0.6.3/能力整合[1.14.4]-Fabric0.6.3.jar" "-Duser.home=null" -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC "-XX:G1NewSizePercent=20" "-XX:G1ReservePercent=20" "-XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50" "-XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M" -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx4096m "-Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true" "-Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true" "-Djava.library.path=/home/zcq/Game/1.14.4fabric/.minecraft/versions/能力整合[1.14.4]-Fabric0.6.3/natives" "-Dminecraft.launcher.brand=HMCL" "-Dminecraft.launcher.version=3.3.172" -cp
